ModMetaData.name: More Frosty RimFridge Drinks
ModMetaData.author: Sokyran, Hush
ModMetaData.description:
Do you like my mods? You can support me on Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/sokyran
A mod that adds more drinks that can become frosty with RimFridge, making them give positive boost when drank.
Tested on 1.3, 1.4, and 1.5 - however, there's a high chance it'll work on other versions.
Compatible mods: - Alpha Memes - Bill Doors' Berry Expanded - Blueberries - ChocoCola - Coca Cola And Pepsi Mod - CuproPanda's Drinks - Epona race Renaissance - Fungihol - GingerAle - Grains and Brewing - Hemogen Cuisine - Irn Bru And Other Scottish Delights - Milk Dragon - Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition - More Archotech Garbage - MorrowRim - Alcohol Remade - New Ratkin Race - Randy Burger - Fast Food set - RimCuisine 2: Bottling And Booze - RimCuisine 2: Core - RimFortress: Dwarven Plants - Rotmeth - Russian traditional food - Simple Sake - Smokeleaf Industry Reborn - Star Trek: Races - Stoneborn - Delights - Vanilla Brewing Expanded - Vanilla Factions Expanded - Medieval - Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates - Vanilla Factions Expanded - Settlers - Vanilla Plants Expanded - VGP Vegetable Garden - VGP Garden Drinks - VGP Garden Drinks UF - VGP Garden Gourmet - Winery, Wine Making and Ageing - Zen Garden Plus
Feel free to suggest more, I'm open for suggestions!
